long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon & Kindle: Details page  Previewer - V-1.8

Easy Shopping! Peek Inside Products details page with Amazon & Kindle Preview, without opening each product page.

Please read fully for better usage of this cool tool ( 1 minute read at 25 words/sec)

See product descriptions, prices and details for both Amazon and Kindle Store items (including KDP titles and eBooks) directly. Just on mouse over the interested product listing.
Make quick decisions without the tab-juggling hassle.
This works with all Amazon domains and countries.
Tired of clicking back and forth between search results and product pages on Amazon and Kindle Store?. Tired of tab overload?  Amazon Preview is your time-saving hero for shopping on Amazon and Kindle Store!

How to use this tool for best results: 
Just hover the mouse over a product on any page, just hold it there for about a second and see the details of the product on a preview box right on that page. 

To see inside the the preview box, move mouse to the box without hovering over any other product link or just move quick inside the preview box or in between the space of products. 
If you move the cursor quickly over many links and the code gets confused and may show unwanted results, so kindly move the mouse slowly over the items and get the best out of the tool. 
FEEL FREE to suggest any ideas  for improvements and your suggestions, we will be more than happy for your responses.

(NOTE: It will take few seconds to display the content based on internet, Amazon page and your browser load. Kindly wait till everything loads. Also, if it is not showing what you wanted to see, just move the cursor out of any link and wait for a second and then keep the mouse on the product you want to see the details. You will get used up if you are working few times and will know what to do, so don't get annoyed at the beginning itself if something goes off, it is how this universe works...)

Amazon Preview keeps things simple:

PRO TIPS: You can view multiple products details on a go, just keep your mouse on top of multiple products for a short time and move to next item. Be cautious, too much of load can give bad results, safe to see up to 4 products at a time. 
Click X on the preview box to close it, to re use just refresh page.
Shop smarter, not harder!
Download Amazon Preview today and experience a smoother, more relaxed shopping experience!

Note: The developer is affiliated to Amazon.com
